product_name: Tifosi DEA Fototec Photochromic Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: Lightweight and durable, the women's Tifosi DEA Fototec Photochromic Sunglasses feature variable tint technology to adjust rapidly to changing light conditions for superior clarity and protection.
